values: 保护；看守；警戒；护卫；监视；保留（信息、权利等）；避免（损失或伤害）
警卫员；看守；保安；保护；警戒状态；安全措施；防护装置；防护罩；防护用品；后卫（体育运动中的位置）；防御姿势（拳击等运动中）；警戒；防备；戒守卫；护卫队

synonym.mean: 守卫；警戒；护卫队；防护装置

word_list: keep one's eye on the ball

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 谨慎的；被监视着的；警戒着的；被看守著的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指寻找安全地方躲避风雨或使人免遭危害。
普通用词，指保持警惕以防可能的攻击或伤害。
贬义词，指隐匿或非法保护、窝藏。
语气强，指采取积极措施预防可能发生的一切攻击或危险。
普通用词，指用武力或其它措施使人或物不受损害，消除危险。用作比喻时，指坚持某种行动、决定或意见。
语气比protect强，但侧重防止迫在眉睫的攻击或伤害。
普通用词，指用某种手段作为防御工具以防危险或伤害。

word_group.brief_definition: 安全保卫；安全防护；安全防范

bilingual.source: The guard is at the entrance to guard.
There is a guard on duty in the guardhouse.
bilingual.target: 警卫室里有一位警卫正在值班。

bilingual.source: The guard is standing at the entrance.
He used to be a guard in the army.
bilingual.target: 他曾经是一名军队的警卫。

bilingual.source: The guard stood alertly at the entrance.
bilingual.target: 警卫警觉地站在入口处。

bilingual.source: The guard stands at the entrance all day.
bilingual.target: 警卫整天站立在入口处。

bilingual.source: The guard carried a mace for protection.
bilingual.target: 警卫带着一根狼牙棒以作防身。

bilingual.source: The guard patrols at night to ensure safety.
bilingual.target: 警卫在夜间巡逻，确保安全。

bilingual.source: We need a guard to protect this area.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个警卫来保护这个区域。

bilingual.source: The guard denied admittance to the restricted area.
bilingual.target: 警卫拒绝了进入限制区的许可。

list.abstract: EwidoSecurity(网络安全防护软件)或是联想拯救者(硬盘备份软件)的相关进程。

yingyinNormal.en: And this uptight couple told the security guard to arrest us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那对保守夫妻告诉警卫来抓我们。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine, but, you know, she flew all the way over here for some coast guard training. She can't drive a couple hours to see you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，但她都大老远飞来进行海岸警卫队训练了，她都没法开几小时车来见你吗？

yingyinNormal.en: In case you have no idea what's going on, I'm swelling these states' National Guard troops to create secure public spaces on Election Day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以防你们不明白这是怎么回事。我要扩充这些州的国民警卫队。以确保选举日公共场合的安全性。

yingyinNormal.en: At guard it's Number 17, Jeremy Lin!
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在上场的是后卫，十七号，林书豪！

yingyinNormal.en: You can't serve in the Kings-guard with one hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一只手无法胜任御林铁卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Drink up. Wait. Prison guard. Were you a prison guard before? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喝了吧，等等，监狱守卫你以前做过监狱守卫吗? 没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Someone has to stay here to guard the pirate ship. Me. I will guard it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人要待在这里看守海盗船。我，我来看守它。

yingyinNormal.en: The facility is hidden beneath the local power plant under military guard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个设备被藏在本地发电厂的地底，周围有军队守卫。

yingyinNormal.en: I assure, my Lord, Legolas thinks of me as no more than a Captain of the Guard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我向您保证，主上，在他眼里，我只不过是个卫队长。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's go. I got an extra guard duty. Today and I'm on KP this morning. So I can't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们走吧。我有额外的执勤，今天上午我得去K.P，以我不能。

yingyinNormal.en: Energon detectors guard its cities now. Long range defense systems watch the skies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能量块探测器保卫着地球上的城市，远程防御系统监视着天空。

yingyinNormal.en: King Runeard, I'm sorry. I don't understand. Grandfather? We bring Arendelle's full guard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鲁纳德国王，抱歉，我不明白。祖父。我们带上艾伦戴尔的全部护卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Mr. President, this is catching us all off guard over here. State, local, we had no idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统先生，这让我们猝不及防。州里的，当地的，我们都不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: And then another security guard came over And, like, whispered, "I think he plays on the team."
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后另一个保安走过来，对着之前那个耳语道，“他应该是在队上打球的”。

yingyinNormal.en: I know the press conference must've caught you off guard, but the president didn't want you to know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道那个新闻发布会肯定让你很意外，但总统不想让你知道。

yingyinNormal.en: I know it can be tempting now that you have a chance, but if this goes public too early, his guard goes up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你现在有了机会，这很诱人，但如果这一切过早公布，他会提高警惕。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's that written? I can and I will. The Kings-guard oath is for life. The war is over. The king is safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪里写着了?我能，我也会，御林铁卫是终身誓言。战争已经结束，国王很安全。

yingyinNormal.en: The declaration caught him off guard. Had to keep him out of it. It's his constituents that actually fight the damn thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那声明让他措手不及，得让他别掺和。是他的选民真要去打仗。

yingyinNormal.en: How would you like to pay? Credit card. Oh no, but I left my credit card with Joey. Okay, I'll go get it. You guard the ring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要怎么付帐？刷卡，不对，我的卡在乔伊那边，我回去拿，你守住戒指。

yingyinNormal.en: Pedro Pony is outside, keeping guard. Here comes Madame Gazelle. Madame Gazelle is coming. We are not ready. Stop her, Pedro. OK.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小马佩德罗一再在外面守着。羚羊夫人来了。各位了羚羊夫人来了。我们还没准备好，别让他进来，佩德罗。好的！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 保卫; 保护; 警卫
看守; 监视; 警戒

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 保卫; 保护; 警卫

examination_example.sentence: Personal grievance procedures were designed to <highlight>guard</highlight> the jobs of ordinary workers from "unjustified dismissals".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人申诉程序旨在保护普通工人的工作免受“无理解雇”。

examination_example.sentence: You meet new people every day: the grocery worker, the cab driver, new people at work or the security <highlight>guard</highlight> at the door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天都会遇到新的人：杂货店的工人、出租车司机、新同事或门口的保安。

sense_info_list.zh: 看守; 监视; 警戒

sense_info_list.en: a railway official who travels on and is responsible for a train

word_usage.usage: guard作名词，表示“卫队，警卫”时，常用单数形式，强调整体时，其谓语动词用第三人称单数，强调个体时，其谓语动词用复数形式，如：The guard is/are being inspected today. 卫兵今天正在接受检查。
guard作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或者代词，如：guard the entrance，；也可用于被动结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They're more cautious about sharing information with nonmembers, as the organization <highlight>guards</highlight> against others developing the ability to hijack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在与非成员分享信息时更加谨慎，因为组织要防止其他人发展劫持能力。

examination_example.sentence: These days, the Coca-Cola recipe is a closely <highlight>guarded</highlight> secret.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，可口可乐的配方是一个严格保密的秘密。
这一发现让卡莉措手不及。

sense_info_list.en: watch over in order to protect or control

word_usage.usage: guard作“警戒，警惕”时，是不可数名词。

表示“没有警惕，毫无戒备”应该用off (one's) guard，而不是without guard；
相应地，表示“保持警惕”应该用on one's guard而非with guard。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 指用武力或其它措施使人或物不受损害, 消除危险。用作比喻时, 指坚持某种行动、决定或意见。
普通用词, 指保持警惕以防可能的攻击或伤害。
贬义词, 指隐匿或非法保护、窝藏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: More than 50 workers at the store have signed a letter calling for a permanent security <highlight>guard</highlight> following a series of incidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在发生一系列事件后，50多名店员签署了一封公开信，呼吁设立一名永久的保安人员。

examination_example.sentence: Staff at a suburban supermarket in Melbourne say they feel unsafe at work after security <highlight>guards</highlight> were removed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 墨尔本郊区一家超市的工作人员说，保安被带走后，他们觉得工作不安全。

examination_example.sentence: To call for a permanent security <highlight>guard</highlight>.

sense_info_list.en: watch over in order to protect or control

examination_example.sentence: "A security worker had <highlight>guarded</highlight> the store each night from 7pm until 12am, but that had stopped suddenly on Monday,” employees said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “从晚上7点到凌晨12点，每晚都有一名安保人员守卫着商店，但周一突然停止了，”员工们说。

examination_example.sentence: There's a Coast <highlight>Guard</highlight> building and a tall trade tower, as well as a park, golf course and university. Chances are you've actually seen this place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 城内有一幢海岸警卫楼，一座高耸的贸易大厦，还有一片公园，一个高尔夫球场以及一所大学。实际上你可能见过这个地方。

word_usage.usage: guard作“警戒，警惕”时，是不可数名词。

表示“没有警惕，毫无戒备”应该用off (one's) guard，而不是without guard；
相应地，表示“保持警惕”应该用on one's guard而非with guard。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指用武力或其它措施使人或物不受损害，消除危险。用作比喻时，指坚持某种行动、决定或意见。
普通用词，指保持警惕以防可能的攻击或伤害。
贬义词，指隐匿或非法保护、窝藏。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 安全保卫；安全防护；安全防范

examination_example.sentence: But my father finally chose to stay because he wanted to <highlight>guard</highlight> the gate for other people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我父亲最终选择了留下，因为他想为其他人守门。

examination_example.sentence: Wang Jicai devoted his life to <highlight>guarding</highlight> the island.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王继才毕生致力于守卫这座岛屿。

examination_example.sentence: This, they said, helps <highlight>guard</highlight> against the aging process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们说，这有助于防止衰老过程。

examination_example.sentence: In the past, our school safety <highlight>guards</highlight> had to stand in the middle of the road after school to stop the cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去，我们学校的警卫队必须在放学后站在路中间拦截车辆。

examination_example.sentence: They can work as <highlight>guards</highlight> like dogs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以像狗一样充当警卫。

examination_example.sentence: What did the emperor show the <highlight>guards</highlight>?

word_usage.usage: guard作“警戒，警惕”时，是不可数名词。

表示“没有警惕，毫无戒备”应该用off (one's) guard，而不是without guard；
相应地，表示“保持警惕”应该用on one's guard而非with guard。
